errand.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a short journey in order to do something for someone, for example delivering or collecting something for them
errand.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: I seemed to spend my life running errands for people.
She was always sending me on errands.
He quickly set out on his errand of mercy  (=journey to help someone in danger).
I couldnâ€™t stop because I was on an errand.
